Detailed Description

Type: Class

Purpose: This is the general Monochrome Xform (uses a grayTRCTag)

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Member Function Documentation

void CIccXformMonochrome::Apply ( CIccApplyXform *  pApply,
icFloatNumber *  DstPixel,
const icFloatNumber *  SrcPixel 
) const
virtual

Name: CIccXformMonochrome::Apply

Purpose: Does the actual application of the Xform.

Args: pApply = ApplyXform object containing temporary storage used during Apply DstPixel = Destination pixel where the result is stored, SrcPixel = Source pixel which is to be applied.

Implements CIccXform.

References icPerceptualRefWhiteX, icPerceptualRefWhiteY, icPerceptualRefWhiteZ, icSigLabData, icXyzToPcs(), CIccPCS::XyzToLab(), and CIccPCS::XyzToLab2().

icStatusCMM CIccXformMonochrome::Begin ( )
virtual

Name: CIccXformMonochrome::Begin

Purpose: Does the initialization of the Xform before Apply() is called. Must be called before Apply().

Reimplemented from CIccXform.

References CIccXform::Begin(), icCmmStatOk, icCmmStatProfileMissingTag, and icSigGrayTRCTag.

LPIccCurve * CIccXformMonochrome::ExtractInputCurves ( )
virtual

Name: CIccXformMonochrome::ExtractInputCurves

Purpose: Gets the input curves. Should be called only after Begin() has been called. Once the curves are extracted, they will not be used by the Apply() function. WARNING: caller owns the curves and must be deleted by the caller.

Return: Pointer to the input curves.

Implements CIccXform.

LPIccCurve * CIccXformMonochrome::ExtractOutputCurves ( )
virtual

Name: CIccXformMonochrome::ExtractOutputCurves

Purpose: Gets the output curves. Should be called only after Begin() has been called. Once the curves are extracted, they will not be used by the Apply() function. WARNING: caller owns the curves and must be deleted by the caller.

Return: Pointer to the output curves.

Implements CIccXform.

CIccCurve * CIccXformMonochrome::GetCurve ( icSignature  sig) const
protected

Name: CIccXformMonochrome::GetCurve

Purpose: Gets the curve having the passed signature, from the profile.

Args: sig = signature of the curve to be found

Return: Pointer to the curve.

References CIccTag::GetType(), icSigCurveType, and icSigParametricCurveType.

CIccCurve * CIccXformMonochrome::GetInvCurve ( icSignature  sig) const
protected

Name: CIccXformMonochrome::GetInvCurve

Purpose: Gets the inverted curve having the passed signature, from the profile.

Args: sig = signature of the curve to be inverted

Return: Pointer to the inverted curve.

References CIccCurve::Begin(), and CIccCurve::Find().
